front.title: YANG Data Model for DetNet Mapping with Network Slice

abstract.t: The convergence of IETF Network Slicing with DetNet achieves adequate network resource allocation and reservation to each node along the way of DetNet flows for latency-sensitive services. This document introduces the applicability of DetNet to network slice, DetNet mapping with Network Slice requirements and YANG data models extensions in the context of IP/ MPLS network.
